field.label: enabled
field.help: Select if job is enabled or not

field.label: Minutes
field.help: Enter the minutes for the job to act, can also be a comma-separated list, * (each) or a range (ex. 10,20,30 or 10-30)

field.label: Hours
field.help: Enter the hours for the job to act, can also be a comma-separated list, * (each) or a range (ex. 10,11,12 or 10-12)

field.label: Day of the month
field.help: Enter the days of the month for the job to act, can also be a comma-separated list, * (each) or a range (ex. 1,20,28 or 1-28)

field.label: Months
field.help: Enter the months for the job to act, can also be a comma-separated list, * (each) or a range (ex. 1,2,3 or 1-3)

field.label: Days of the week
field.help: Enter the days of the week for the job to act, can also be a comma-separated list, * (each) or a range (ex. 1,2,3 or 1-3)

field.label: Command
field.help: Select the command that needs to be executed at given time frame.

field.label: Parameters
field.help: Enter parameters for this job if required.

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description to explain what this job is intended for.
